name: Deflection (Xisip)
description:
You are in a strange planet infested by enemy ships, your only oportunity to escape is surviving the attacks deflecting the enemy bullets!

------------------------------------------------------

Game made for MashUp Game Jam 2

Theme: Unconventional Means

My interpretation of the theme on this game is that you are in a bullet hell and cant shoot, but you can deflect the bullets from the enemies, so in the end its not conventional that you cannot shot in this type of games!
